meanings.definition: A small, rounded mass or lump.
meanings.sent1: I found a bosset of clay in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The chef added a bosset of butter to the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy rolled around with a bosset of yarn.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a bosset of joy.
meanings.sent5: The bosset of flowers in the vase brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: To form into a rounded mass or lump.
meanings.sent1: She tried to bosset the dough into a perfect ball.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully bosseted the clay into a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent3: He bosseted his socks into a messy pile on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The children bosseted the sand into a castle at the beach.
meanings.sent5: The chef bosseted the ingredients together to create a delicious dish.
